title: Gravity Basics
description: Cyla learned about gravity today — the force that attracts two bodies toward each other. We tried a few small experiments and recorded the results.

title: Neural Nets Intro
description: Introduced to neural networks: what neurons, layers, and weights are. Cyla trained a tiny model to recognize basic patterns.

title: Motion Laws
description: Studied Newton's laws of motion and observed how forces affect object movement. Built a small simulation.

title: Dataset Cleanup
description: Cleaned and normalized a dataset — dropped nulls, standardized formats, and logged data quality metrics.
